I can see this ending horribly. Replacing one code with one from another sources is not the best idea unless you know what you’re doing, which I’m not so sure he does.

read that and do it. :P[/quote]

Something tells me with the information you gave… he has a better chance of not failing!
As long as your Client.Java is backed up, no worries:P

item.title: Help appreciated =)
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Try this (This is what I had for my void, so no credits to me, All to Nader for making Naderpkz v3)

[code]public void youdied() {
for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];

            if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                remove(item, r);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
        }
    }
    for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
        try {
            if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                        playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                        getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {}
    }
    removeAllItems();
    for (int r = 0; r < playerEquipment.length; r++) {
        try {
            int item = playerEquipment[r];

            if ((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
                remove(item, r);
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment");
        }
    }
    for (int rr = 0; rr < playerItems.length; rr++) {
        try {
            if (playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 20000) {
                // createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1);
                ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr] - 1, absX, absY,
                        playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);
                // createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]);
                deleteItem(playerItems[rr] - 1,
                        getItemSlot(playerItems[rr] - 1), playerItemsN[rr]); 
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {}
    }
    removeAllItems();
    teleportToX = 3094;
    teleportToY = 3478;
    // pEmote = 15;
    // pWalk = 13;
    sendMessage("Oh dear, you GOT OWNED");
    hitDiff = 0;	
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

[/code]

Read full topic

public void youdied()
{

}

deleteItem(5510, 1);
}
if(playerHasItem(5512)){
deleteItem(5512, 1);
}
if(playerHasItem(5514)){
deleteItem(5514, 1);
}
if(playerHasItem(6570)){
keep6570 = true;
deleteItem(6570, 1);
}
if (!isSkulled) {
keepItemHandle();
}
if (ProtItem) {
applyProtectItemProt();
}

client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
youdied();
killerz.sM(“You have defeated “+playerName+”.”);
